short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract all images from current web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension you can grab all images from current web page and download them as a single zip-archive. Also, it provides an interface to select which images to download.
